accountSettings.arrAccountId: <fill in the account ID from the Azure Portal>
accountSettings.arrAccountKey: <fill in the account key from the Azure Portal>
accountSettings.region: <select from available regions: eastus2, westeurope, westus2, southeastasia>

assetConversionSettings.resourceGroup: <resource group which contains the storage account you created, only needed when uploading or generating SAS>
assetConversionSettings.storageAccountName: <name of the storage account you created>
assetConversionSettings.localAssetDirectoryPath: <fill in a path to a local directory containing your asset (and files referenced from it like textures)>
assetConversionSettings.inputFolderPath: <optional: base folderpath in the input container for asset upload. uses / as dir separator>
assetConversionSettings.inputAssetPath: <the path to the asset under inputcontainer/inputfolderpath pointing to the input asset e.g. box.fbx>
assetConversionSettings.outputFolderPath: <optional: base folderpath in the output container - the converted asset and log files will be placed here>
assetConversionSettings.outputAssetFileName: <optional: filename for the converted asset, this will be placed in the output container under the outputpath>
